# Welcome Point

URL: http://wtp.agh.edu.pl/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:07:43

NAWA & Welcome to Poland 2.0
AGH University Centre for International Affairs has been selected as a beneficiary of the Welcome to Poland program for the second time Our grant application: “Development of AGH University Potential…

Read More
“My 2 minutes”- training
Join the “My 2 Minutes” Workshop: Build Your Career Path in Poland at AGH University! under Welcome to Poland NAWA Programme Are you an AGH international student, PhD candidate, or…

Read More

Do you come from another country and are you going to work at the AGH University of Krakow? You have come to the right place! We offer all incoming international staff and their families specialist assistance and practical support on various issues related to moving to Krakow.

We will put you in touch with other relevant contacts and help you to prepare your arrival at AGH and to make your stay with us a successful one.

Enjoy browsing our website for information and services!
